title: 米寇·法兰克指挥舒曼《天堂与仙子》
short_description: 凭借细腻的情节和童话般的转折，舒曼的《天堂与仙子》当仁不让地成为了19世纪最伟大的浪漫主义合唱作品之一。本场演出的指挥是米寇·法兰克，他娴熟地辗转与清剧般的宣叙、英雄般的合唱以及如歌般的独唱之间，并将戏剧化的紧张气氛贯穿始终。(语出《金融时报》)

interview.title: 米寇·法兰克对话马修·亨特
interview.description: In January 2018, Mikko Franck gave an impressive performance of Maurice Ravel’s L’Enfant et les sortilèges together with the Berliner Philharmoniker. It was a stroke of luck that scarcely six months later, the Finnish conductor was available to stand in at short notice for Sir Simon Rattle who had to cancel his participation in the performance of Robert Schumann’s beautiful but rarely played oratorio Paradise and the Peri. In conversation with viola player Matthew Hunter, a member of the Philharmoniker since 1996, Franck tells of his earliest experiences as a conductor, of the balance between urban and rural life, the natural landscapes of his native Finland and the principles that guide him in his musical work.
interview.short_description: 2018年5月，米寇·法兰克指挥柏林爱乐乐团上演了舒曼的清唱剧作品《天堂与仙子》。在演出的间隙，法兰克与乐团的中提琴演奏员马修·亨特进行了一次对话。
